content: simple shapes bold colors and repetition make these turtles a fun finished project and an easy knit make one or a dozen turtles all the way up and all the way down the sky s the limit when it comes to turtles **yarn notes** knitpicks wool of the andes worsted 100% peruvian highland wool 110yd/100m per 50g skein mc jalapeno 1 skein cc1 calypso heather 1 skein cc2 evergreen 1 skein cc3 blackberry 1 skein *note each turtle uses about 25 yds of the mc and about 40 yds of the cc so this pattern works well with partial skeins * **errata - shell top** there s an extra line for round 19 on the shell top please ignore it after working round 17 and binding off you can now proceed to the shell bottom
